item.title: A unit of Kanjeevaram looms in Hyderabad, established by textile designer Gaurang Shah, looks to revive heritage designs
item.description:
<![CDATA[The steady, rhythmic rattle of the looms is audible as we enter a house in Injapuram, on the outskirts of Hyderabad. Brothers Yadagiri and Nagaraj, who were earlier part of the Gadwal silk weaving community at Amangal, Ranga Reddy district, in Telangana, now oversee the 12-loom Kanjeevaram unit in Injapuram, established by Hyderabad-based textile designer Gaurang Shah.
There is a steady output of premium handwoven Kanjeevaram saris from these looms, with some of them reviving heritage designs a...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: KK, daughter GHMC mayor Vijayalakshmi to leave BRS on March 30, KCR upset, son denies hand
item.description:
<![CDATA[HYDERABAD: Senior BRS leader and Rajya Sabha MP Kancharla Keshava Rao (KK) may return to the Congress fold with his daughter and Hyderabad Mayor Gadwal Vijayalakshmi on March 30.
It is said that the senior BRS leader met party chief K Chandrashekar Rao and expressed his wish to return to the Congress from where he started his political career. Party sources said that the BRS supreme was upset with KK’s decision as he enjoyed every position during the decade-long rule of KCR and wanted to quit w...]]>
item.author: Jbs Umanadh

item.title: Video: Hyderabad Mayor draws ire over sword display at Bathukamma event
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Hyderabad Mayor Vijaylaxmi Gadwal raked in controversy after brandishing a sword at Bathukamma celebrations at NBT Nagar Banjara Hills on Thursday, October 10.
The Mayor uploaded the video on her social media accounts where women dressed in traditional attire are seen dancing to music played on a DJ system at high volume.
In the videos, the Hyderabad Mayor who is standing atop a dais, is seen brandishing a sword. “No one should put evil eye on women and girls in NBT Nagar. Today I a...]]>
item.author: News Desk

item.title: Hyderabad Mayor Vijayalakshmi Booked for Noise Pollution Violations
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad:The Banjara Hills police on Sunday booked a suo motu case against Hyderabad mayor Gadwal Vijayalakshmi for violating noise pollution norms during the Bathukamma celebrations on October 10.
According to the police, the mayor was present at the Bathukamma celebrations at NBT Nagar where DJs played loud music beyond permitted hours. Locals complained to the police about the noise pollution during late hours.
Speaking at the event, Vijayalakshmi said that some jealous people did not li...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author

item.title: MLA explanation about his party changing
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishnamohan Reddy has publicly addressed recent rumors about his potential shift to the Congress Party. He clarified that these stories circulating on TV channels and social media were deliberately planted to cause confusion and frustration.
Reddy emphasized that he remains committed to the BRS party and assured that the party is not facing any internal breakup. This statement was made during a media interaction at the BRS party office in the Jogulamba Gadwal district...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Alampur MLA, others held for switching on Tummilla motors in absence of Congress leader
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) working president K.T. Rama Rao has criticised the Jogulamba-Gadwal district administration and the police for arresting Alampur MLA Vijayudu along with a few farmers and local leaders of the party for switching on the motors of Tummilla lift irrigation project to supplement water to the Rajolibanda Diversion Scheme (RDS) ayacut.
According to information reaching here, the MLA along with some BRS leaders went to Tummilla in Vaddepally mandal in the district, located...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Gadwal MLA set to return to BRS, meets KTR
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Gadwal MLA B Krishna Mohan Reddy who had recently switched over to Congress has decided to return back to the BRS party. In a significant development on Tuesday, the MLA called on BRS working president K T Rama Rao in the Assembly to express his resolve to return back to the party fold.
The MLA who will be formally returning to the BRS will also be meeting BRS chief K Chandrasekhar Rao shortly. This development comes within a month of his defection to the Congress, in presence of Chi...]]>
item.author: Md Nizamuddin

item.title: Stray dogs attack police in Jogulamba Gadwal, officer hospitalised
item.description:
<![CDATA[ALAMPUR: Stray dogs attacked police personnel in Alampur, where officers had gathered for VIP security duties at the Jogulamba temple. An ASI named Basha was injured in the attack and was immediately taken to the hospital for treatment.
Devotees visiting the temple have raised concerns about the increasing number of stray dogs in Alampur. Many have asked authorities to take action and control the situation. Locals attribute the growing problem to dogs being abandoned by pilgrims travelling from...]]>
item.author: Newstap Bureau

item.title: ASHRA Gadwal District Committee Appointments Announced: Ramu Bharath Takes Charge as District President
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Appointment of ASHRA Gadwal District Committee, The appointment letters were handed over by ASHRA Founder and Supreme Court Advocate Havij Sultan Ali.
ASHRA aims to raise awareness about consumer rights and to file consumer cases whenever their rights are violated, ensuring justice is served. The organization, which started with its headquarters in Hyderabad, currently operates in 10 states, providing services with 1,000 members. As part of this initiative, the district committee member...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: BRS Party Senior Leader Nagar Doddi Venkat Ramudu Reaffirms Party 's Strength and Support In Gadwal.
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal : In a stirring and well-attended gathering at the KS Function Hall in Gadwal, senior state leader of the Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS), Nagar Doddi Venkataramulu, delivered a powerful speech assuring the party's unwavering support for every worker in the Gadwal constituency.
During the meeting, Venkataramulu emphasized that the BRS remains a steadfast pillar for all its dedicated workers and urged them not to lose hope amidst the current political challenges. He took the opportunity to c...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Stray dogs attack continue in Telangana, six year old attacked in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Stray dogs attack continue in Telangana, six year old attacked in Gadwal
A group of dogs attacked the boy while he was playing in front of his house. His mother, Sirisha, had asked him to fetch a milk packet from a nearby shop. As Revanth was on his way to the shop, the dogs pounced on him, causing severe injuries. Reports indicate that he sustained injuries to his eyelids, hands, and head.
By Telangana Today Updated On - 4 October 2024, 02:26 PM
Representational Image
Jogulamba Gadwal: Stra...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
